summary:
This mod will add 2 custom weapons to the forge under the Steel category.
Both of the craftables do not require any perks, and can also be improved at the grindstone.
This mod was a request by Turinu.
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
This mod will add 2 custom weapons to the forge under the Steel category.
These 2 new weapons include a custom form of sabre, which is balanced around a deadric sword, but lower damage and higher speed.
The other weapon is one handed sword, which is also based on a daedric sword, but slower with a higher damage per hit.
Both of the craftables do not require any perks, and can also be improved at the grindstone. However, you do need the arcane smithing perk to be able to sharpen it while it\'s enchanted, just like vanilla weapons.

This mod was a request by Turinu.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None so far.

History
=======
v1 - Initial release
v2 - Added Crest Sword, Renamed Katana to Sabre, Scabbards received textures.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the CK.
Thanks to The Nexus.com for the great service they provide.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to Turinu for his request and his designs.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Blender - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=12248
GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
The contents of this mod can only be used after obtaining permission from the original authors.
(Turinu / Urwy.)
author: Urwy and Turinu
